meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being early.
meanings.sent1: Her earliness to the meeting impressed everyone with her punctuality.
meanings.sent2: The earliness of the sunrise brought a sense of freshness to the morning.
meanings.sent3: His earliness to the party made him the first one to try the delicious snacks.
meanings.sent4: The earliness of the flowers blooming in spring surprised the gardeners.
meanings.sent5: The earliness of the bird's chirping signaled the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: The state of occurring or being done before the expected or usual time.
meanings.sent1: The earliness of the bus arrival caught many passengers off guard.
meanings.sent2: We appreciated the earliness of the restaurant's service as we were quite hungry.
meanings.sent3: The earliness of the snowfall in autumn made for a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent4: The earliness of his response to the email saved the project from delays.
meanings.sent5: The earliness of the train departure allowed us to reach our destination sooner.
